item.title: 请看视频显示了一艘巨型货轮撞上弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的瞬间，造成巴尔的摩港几乎完全坍塌。
item.description:
SEE IT: Dramatic video shows the moment a massive cargo ship crashed into the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing a near-total collapse into the Baltimore harbor.

The crash appeared to be accidental, not intentional, officials said. https://t.co/7RAi4TeZQQ pic.twitter.com/mR7Zew5Rvs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 卡桑德拉-"卡西"-文图拉（Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura）的前搭档肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）在洛杉矶和迈阿密的住所于周一遭到联邦特工突袭的消息传出后，她发表了自己的看法。
item.description:
Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura is speaking out following news that her former partner Sean "Diddy" Combs' Los Angeles and Miami homes were raided by federal agents on Monday. https://t.co/5S79hYfrjs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统就巴尔的摩大桥垮塌事件发表讲话，他对居民说："只要需要，我们就会与你们在一起。
item.description:
Pres. Biden gave remarks on the Baltimore bridge collapse, telling residents "we're going to stay with you as long as it takes."

Biden, who noted he's been over the bridge many times, said he plans to visit Baltimore as soon as possible. https://t.co/7UV4FBJHaT pic.twitter.com/g52jEQjEZc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）说，在一艘巨型货轮撞上支撑柱之前，官员们阻止了巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥上的车流，帮助挽救了灾难中的生命。
item.description:
Officials were able to stop the flow of traffic onto the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore before a massive cargo ship crashed into a support column, helping to save lives in the disaster, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said. https://t.co/pqiyX0oxOs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统说："这无疑拯救了生命"。
item.description:
LATEST: Personnel on the ship alerted the Maryland Department of Transportation that they lost control of the vessel, and local authorities were able to close the bridge before it was struck, "which undoubtedly saved lives," Pres. Biden said.https://t.co/jHtm617UkH pic.twitter.com/nYPdJCWBPt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据研究人员称，全球气温上升可能会改变世界上大部分葡萄酒的生产地，因为中纬度地区可能无法再种植葡萄。
item.description:
Rising global temperatures could change where the majority of the world's wine is produced as mid-latitude regions may no longer be able to grow grapes, according to researchers. https://t.co/ioIn3t2gkr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：国土安全调查局的联邦探员在法庭授权搜查肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）的两处房产时，查获了大量电子设备，执法人员告诉 @ABC 新闻。
item.description:
BREAKING: Federal agents with Homeland Security Investigations seized a number of electronic devices as part of the court-authorized searches of Sean "Diddy" Combs' two properties, law enforcement sources told @ABC News. https://t.co/zae2mCYKnM pic.twitter.com/dzJlX5sTUG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，特朗普竞选团队的一位前助手已被传唤，作为亚利桑那州另一项调查的一部分，该调查正在调查推翻该州 2020 年大选结果的行为。
item.description:
A former Trump campaign aide has been subpoenaed as part of a separate probe in Arizona that is investigating efforts to overturn the 2020 election results in that state, according to a source familiar with the matter.https://t.co/aVWMU7Adfg https://t.co/qGDHF3COdL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 请看：新的视频显示了弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在一艘巨型货轮与大桥相撞后坍塌到巴尔的摩港的瞬间，车辆坠入桥下的水中。
item.description:
SEE IT: New video shows the moment the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed into the Baltimore harbor after a massive cargo ship collided with the bridge, sending vehicles plunging into the water below.https://t.co/wryILURkS0 pic.twitter.com/Dh9ta8XhLT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：执法部门消息人士告诉 @ABC 新闻，联邦特工在法庭授权搜查肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）的两处房产时，查获了大量电子设备。
item.description:
JUST IN: Federal agents have seized a number of electronic devices as part of the court-authorized searches of Sean "Diddy" Combs' two properties, law enforcement sources tell @ABC News. https://t.co/TnYAGR78o4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯特上周向全世界公布了她的诊断结果，目前正在接受癌症治疗。
item.description:
As Kate, the Princess of Wales, undergoes treatment for cancer after revealing her diagnosis to the world last week, the public is learning more details about the support she is receiving. https://t.co/DdwmvihMk4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周二清晨，一艘巨型货轮撞上巴尔的摩港的弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥，车辆坠入桥下冰冷的海水中。
item.description:
A massive cargo ship crashed into the Francis Scott Key Bridge in the Baltimore harbor early Tuesday morning, sending vehicles plunging into the frigid water below. https://t.co/3FrAe0a9WI pic.twitter.com/3wxlDUYzVG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据交通部称，应马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）的邀请，交通部长皮特-巴蒂吉格（Pete Buttigieg）将于周二前往巴尔的摩钥匙桥了解最新情况：
item.description:
LATEST: Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg will travel to the Baltimore Key Bridge on Tuesday to receive updates, at the invitation of Maryland Gov. Wes Moore, according to the Dept. of Transportation.

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/7UHv8OCeQi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 米非司酮是药物流产两药方案中的第一种药片，也是美国最常见的流产方式：
item.description:
The Supreme Court is considering a challenge to the FDA’s regulation of mifepristone, the first pill taken in a two-drug regimen for a medication-based abortion, which is the most common method of abortion in the country.

The latest: https://t.co/6oywXwQ5kE pic.twitter.com/UESYknFsjs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周一晚，深夜节目主持人斯蒂芬-科尔伯特（Stephen Colbert）在他的节目中向凯特-米德尔顿（Kate Middleton）送上了祝福，两周前，他关于王室传闻的 "泼茶 "独白引起了热议。
item.description:
Late-night host Stephen Colbert sent well wishes to Kate Middleton on his show Monday night, two weeks after going viral with a "spilling the tea" monologue about the rumors surrounding the royal. https://t.co/UCx2CgXXqm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 现在只需花费约 70 美元，您就可以拥有前总统特朗普的 Truth Social 平台背后公司的股份。
item.description:
For approximately $70, you can now own a share of the company behind former Pres. Trump's Truth Social platform. https://t.co/JZVzsuJnKE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 挂牌显示，这艘悬挂新加坡国旗的货轮名为 "Dali"，长 984 英尺，宽 157 英尺。船上有 22 名船员，他们都在印度工作。以下是关于这艘撞向巴尔的摩大桥的巨轮的信息：
item.description:
The Singapore-flagged cargo ship, Dali, spans a length of 984 feet and a width of 157 feet, a listing showed. It holds 22 crew members, all of whom are based in India.

Here's what to know about the massive ship that crashed into the Baltimore bridge: https://t.co/jsjU1MXxhb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：海岸警卫队官员称，在弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥坍塌现场的紧急搜寻仍在继续，至少有六人下落不明：
item.description:
LATEST: At least six people remain unaccounted for as the desperate search continues at the site of the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse, Coast Guard officials say.

There’s nothing to suggest ties to terrorism, the FBI added.

Follow live updates: https://t.co/3sZ2TohiVc pic.twitter.com/aqZqJ1GnJo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：海岸警卫队官员称，在弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌现场的紧急搜寻仍在继续，至少仍有六人下落不明：
item.description:
LATEST: At least six people remain unaccounted for as the desperate search continues at the site of the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse, Coast Guard officials say.

Follow along for live updates from the Baltimore bridge collapse: https://t.co/CAPyKaEt8j

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：国会大厦警方逮捕了 13 名抗议者，他们正在示威抗议最高法院审查对堕胎药米非司酮的限制。
item.description:
BREAKING: Capitol Police have arrested 13 protesters who were demonstrating against the Supreme Court's examination of restrictions to the abortion pill mifepristone. https://t.co/uy2SkEbqhb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 本周二，最高法院将就一起可能重塑全国堕胎机会的案件举行一场高风险听证会。请关注现场更新：
item.description:
A high-stakes hearing is set to play out before the Supreme Court on Tuesday in a case that could reshape abortion access nationwide.

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/NQxEQNYTHA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）在巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥（Francis Scott Key Bridge）坍塌后宣布进入紧急状态：
item.description:
LATEST: Maryland Gov. Wes Moore has declared a state of emergency following the collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore.

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/QtjS3qPusW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：国土安全部部长亚历杭德罗-马约尔卡斯（Alejandro Mayorkas）表示，"没有迹象表明这是一起蓄意行为，"他补充说，"我们正在评估对巴尔的摩港的影响。"请关注巴尔的摩塌桥事故的最新现场报道：
item.description:
LATEST: Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas says "there are no indications this was an intentional act," adding, "we are assessing the impacts to the Port of Baltimore."

Follow along for live updates from the Baltimore bridge collapse: https://t.co/TG2nnR1eJg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。

item.title: 周二清晨，一艘巨型货轮撞上巴尔的摩港的弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥，车辆坠入桥下冰冷的海水中，导致大桥几乎完全坍塌：
item.description:
A massive cargo ship crashed into Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore harbor early Tuesday morning, sending vehicles plunging into the frigid water below and leading to a near-total collapse of the span.

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/MWpYb7Vxlk pic.twitter.com/V5vyOOf3Fi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 白金汉宫官员表示，国王查尔斯三世和王后卡米拉将于周日出席在温莎城堡小教堂举行的复活节仪式。
item.description:
King Charles III and Queen Camilla will attend an Easter service at the chapel at Windsor Castle on Sunday, Buckingham Palace officials said.

The appearance will be the first major event for Charles since he was diagnosed with cancer in February. https://t.co/nmvZ5I8LXz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：消防官员表示，已有两人从水中获救。潜水员仍在搜寻其他落水者。请关注巴尔的摩塌桥事故的最新现场报道：
item.description:
LATEST: Two people have been rescued from the water, fire officials said. Divers are still searching for others in the water.

Follow along for live updates from the Baltimore bridge collapse: https://t.co/PZVtW7AF4k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 英国一家法院已下令推迟引渡朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange），允许维基解密创始人继续上诉，反对将其移交美国接受指控。
item.description:
A court in the U.K. has ordered a delay in the possible extradition of Julian Assange, allowing the WikiLeaks founder to continue his appeal fighting a transfer to the U.S. to face charges. https://t.co/MB7aoErpM2 pic.twitter.com/MSEVC60U1Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：一份未分类的 CISA 报告称，集装箱船 "达利号 "在离港时 "失去推进力"，并警告马里兰州官员可能会发生碰撞。请关注巴尔的摩塌桥事故的最新现场报道：
item.description:
LATEST: The container ship Dali "lost propulsion" as it was leaving port and warned Maryland officials of a possible collision, an unclassified CISA report said.

Follow along for live updates from the Baltimore bridge collapse:https://t.co/jHtm617UkH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：周二早些时候，一艘货轮撞击巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥，造成部分坍塌。该部门表示，潜水员正在搜寻至少七名落水者。
item.description:
LATEST: A cargo ship struck Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday, causing a partial collapse. Divers were searching for at least seven people in the water, the department said. https://t.co/tpE8atstJQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024
